short_summary: Dorchester Penitentiary (Medium Sector) - Tunnel Sewer System Replacement
description: This project involves the provision of materials, labour, equipment, and ancillaries for the replacement of aging sanitary sewer piping in tunnels at Dorchester Pen and the additional work includes: Installation, replacement of building service lines, piping within the building, and tunnel rehabilitation.
full_summary:
**Invitation to Qualify – Tunnel Sewer System Replacement**
===============================================

**Reference Number:** WS4065523414
**Solicitation Number:** WS4065523414
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-22
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-10T14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding

**Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services is inviting qualified bidders to submit their qualifications for the replacement of the aging sanitary sewer piping in the tunnels at Dorchester Penitentiary, Dorchester, New Brunswick.

**Work Description:**
The scope of work includes the provision of all necessary materials, labor, equipment, and ancillary services to replace the existing sewer piping in the tunnels.

**Selection Criteria:**
The procurement process involves two phases. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers, and the second phase will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid.

**Key Contract Details:**

* Estimated Cost: $500,001 to $1,000,000 (HST included)
* Contract Duration: 18 weeks
* Performance Requirements: The contractor is required to complete the work within 18 weeks of award
* Contract Completion Date: The estimated completion date is not specified

**Important Dates:**

* Publication Date: 2023-06-22
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-10T14:00:00

**Updates:**
Note that this tender was previously amended on 2023-06-28.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Sonia Stockman, SPAC/PSPC, at [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit the [Procurement Notice](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16663764?extsite=MTY2NjM3NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
